channel.title: Card Game on About Fergus
channel.description: Recent content in Card Game on About Fergus

item.title: One Night Werewolf Custom Card Game
item.description: A custom print’n’play (PnP) version of the popular social deduction game, One Night Werewolf. Part of a design series experiment to create minimalist cards designed using the tikz library for LaTeX.

item.title: Two Rooms and a Boom Custom Card Game
item.description: A custom print’n’play (PnP) version of the popular social deduction party game, Two Rooms and A Boom. Part of a design experiment to create minimalist cards designed using the tikz library for LaTeX.
